placeDesc: Sam Granger, better known as SamG, has turned his home and yard into a folk art paradise. In the woods of Hollywood, Georgia near Clarkesville, SamG crafts intricate works of art, from a variety of materials. Stop by and check out his collection including the world’s largest grit.
placeShortDesc: A wonderland of folk art including the World’s Largest Grit.
placeRelatedPlaces: ['Virtuoso Sculpture', 'Tiffany Glass Window at The Parish Church of St Cuthbert', 'Mosaic House of Dunedin', "'Bouquet of Tulips'"]
